dmca.title: Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Tommy Smith [mailto:tcsmith3@tomcsmith.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 2:00 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Cease and Desist

Attention:

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries, Andrea Z.  
Almeida, Designated Agent.
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207, (214)782-7800,  
(214782-7756 (Fax).

Please be advised this notice is of Copyright Infringement pursuant  
to Title 17, Section 512, of the United States Code.

This is a written communication to notify you of the copyright  
infringement the copyrighted work at http://buzzdroid.com/apple/when- 
your-macbook-wont-start, titled "When Your MacBook Won't Start",  
published March 17, 2007 and authored by myself, Tommy Smith.

You are hosting a site that is infringing on my copyright. The  
offending url is http://www.satellitecableguide.info/Shutdown.htm.

The material complained has not been authorized by me, the copyright  
owner, my agent, or the law. This information is accurate and I am  
making these statements under penalty of perjury. I am the owner of  
the copyright and the attorney for BuzzDroid.com.

You can contact me using the following information:

Tommy C. Smith, III
Attorney at Law
1600 Virginia Beach Blvd.
Virginia Beach, VA 23454
(757)428-3481
(757)491-6174 (Fax)
Email: tcsmith3@tomcsmith.com
